analysis: The project requires a UI theme update to reflect an Egyptian desert aesthetic with light colors, mobile responsiveness, and functional buttons. The existing files need to be analyzed to ensure they align with the new theme and functionality requirements.

improvements.description: Update the CSS to include an Egyptian-themed color palette with light desert tones such as sandy beige, golden yellows, and deep blues. Ensure the design is clean and mobile-responsive.
Ensure all buttons are functional and styled according to the Egyptian theme. Add hover effects and transitions for better user interaction.
Fix any existing JavaScript errors and ensure the mobile menu toggle functionality is working correctly. Add smooth transitions and user-friendly interactions.
